basic.description: An intermediate course focusing on biomedical applications of lung biology. Topics include lung mechanics, gas exchange, acid-base balance and control of breathing.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Biomedical Respiratory Physiology

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    PHGY 210/6.0 or PHGY 212/6.0 or PHGY 214/6.0 or IDIS150.
